name: msrfo
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mpbir(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))
-| wfn(c0, c1)
-| wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wfn(c0, c1)
-| wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wfn(c0, c1)
-| wf(c0, c1, c1)
-| wi(wf(c0, c1, c1), wfn(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wf(c0, c1, c1)
-| wi(wf(c0, c1, c1), wfn(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 → c1)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wi(wf(c0, c1, c1), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))

|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))

|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 ↠ c2)
⊣ ((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)↔(c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0)))
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))), wceq(c2, crn(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
-| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
-| wi(wceq(c2, crn(c0)), wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
-| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
-| wi(wceq(c2, crn(c0)), wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 ↠ c2)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)
⊣ c2 = ran(c0)
⊣ (c2 = ran(c0)→((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)↔(c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, crn(c0))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmsta, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ c2 = ran(c0)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(mStat ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c2, crn(c0)), wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmsta, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 ↠ c2)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)
⊣ (c2 = ran(c0)→((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)↔(c0 : c1 ↠ ran(c0))))
⊣ c2 =(mStat ` c3)

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c2, crn(c0)), wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfo(c0, c1, c2)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmsta, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 ↠ c2)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(mStat ` c3)

comment: The reduct of a pre-statement is a statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
